title: New game mode
body:
Every three minutes all champions get teleported to a random place on the map, it starts in a smaller radius at first (relative to your current champion location) but by fifty or so minutes you're getting teleported anywhere. 
Dragon and baron would be interesting...

replies.body:
This should be possible lmfao
Imagine someone absolutely destroying someone.. they've got like 2 HP left and then you get teleported the enemy fountain and they get a kill from it hahaha
My life would be made

Not bad.

FYI. You should make game mode suggestion on NA not OCE. Much larger reception on NA boards. In addition. OCE already has a limited player pool. Game mode suggestions on this server typically go unnoticed due to a lack of interest and focus mainly pointed at sustaining the current queues. Mainly ranked.

TLDR: Post on NA.
